document_data.name: Simdet
document_data.occupation:
Farmer
{{Former}} Soldier{{Cite organized play/LFR/Taking Stock of the Situation|24}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Ibeig Simdet''' was a [[dragonborn]] of [[Tymanther]], a member of [[Clan Ibeig]], and a former member of the [[Lance Defenders]] in [[1480 DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Simdet was the wife of [[Ibeig Etoek|Etoek]].
document_data.Activities: Simdet was popular among the members of the [[Platinum Cadre]] stationed in [[Ruinspoke]] for her homemade peach jam.
